Disease.Name: ADENYLOSUCCINASE DEFICIENCY (ADSL)
Disease.Summary: rare (<1:1000000);autosomal recessive; mutation in the ADSL gene;positive Bratton-Marshall-Test;3 different forms:;- fatal neonatal ;- type I (severe form);- type II (mild/moderate form)

symtomp.symptom: behavior, autism or autistic-like / behaviour, autism or autistic-like
CT, brain, abnormalities [-] / CT, kraniell, abnormal

symtomp.category: LUNG OR RESPIRATORY SYSTEM | NERVOUS SYSTEM
